channel.title: topogun on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist
channel.description: Recent content in topogun on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist

item.title: boss ship 2 initial topology done
item.description: still need to get the count down a bit and lay out the UVs in Maya, then texture and a tiny bit of rigging

item.title: deja poo
item.description: almost finished the final low resolution model within the year, tired of clicking. gonna look back and see what i was working on a year ago, exactly. hopefully doesn’t make me too sad, hahah

item.title: progresso?
item.description: finished the hummingbirds course. also completed the decimation/export process from zBrush and got the low-res model going. managed to use some of the old topology from spaceShip 5, so have a decent start not sure why i feel like i didn’t do anything, that sounds productive doesn’t it?

item.title: retopologizing day 3
item.description: i am writing this the morning of the fourth day actually, topology always takes more time than i plan for. i managed to get the model itself done, but it is still lacking UVWs the plan for today is just to get them done, maybe i will make it as far as to bring the model into substance painter to bake the base maps and check for projection errors.

item.title: retopologizing day 2
item.description: currently stopped again from thunder, model approximately 2/3 done. i wonder how much concern is warranted and how much is paranoia in regard to lightning frying electronics i keep reminding myself to just get the mesh out as quickly as possible and that i will still optimize it in maya before laying out the UVW, but it is hard to altogether keep myself from considering topology.

item.title: retopologizing day 1
item.description: didn’t have a ton of time to work today, about a third of the way through the model spent yesterday decimating everything and exporting different detail levels from zBrush
